title: Rusty and Her Family Comics
additional-notes: A note in the January-June 1977 Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information. The renewal for the only issue officially under this title, recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, was filed in April 1977.

Issue 21 of the predecessor title 'Rusty Comics' says 'Rusty and Her Family' on the cover, but the indicia title, and the title under which its renewal record is filed in the CCE, remains 'Rusty Comics'.
